QuestData.Title: The Writhing Haunt
QuestData.Description: The farmers traveled to the Writhing Haunt, an old farm to the northeast, across the river. Someone needs to keep an eye on them.$b$bBring them those rusty weapons and armor you found. We can't have them fighting with pitchforks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Battered Weapons and Armor to Thurman Grant at the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did Valorfist send you? He doesn't know when to let up, does he?
QuestData.RewardText: Well, now that you're here, we'll gladly take that armor off your hands.$b$bYou can keep the weapons, though. These men wouldn't know which end to hold.
